text: @StateDept @SecPompeo #AmericanPeople on @GOP and #COVID19: If they truly cared about their people, they’d behave in a way that is fundamentally different. It’s what we’ve been trying to get them to do for their three years in office, and I’m convinced we’re on the right path to #VoteBlueToSaveAmerica
